TEXT.S:
Taoyuan Taoyuan a sakuwan ku Kaohsiung. kumud nu kalesakan, 969.43 km². kalesakan nu linpanti 871.9 km², kalesakan nu pawliwti 86.77 km², u kasabinawlan sa, izaw ku 4,172 a tademaw. u kasalumaluma' sa, izaw ku 1,320 a luma'. i labu nu kasaniyazu' nu siyang sa, izau ku 3,872 a tademaw nu ingcumin. u kasabinawlan, Pakalatu 93%(Bunun, Hla'alua) ku kasabinawlan. u Bunun atu Hla'alua ku sakalaniyazu'.
nikasakuwakuwan Taoyuan mala 8 a cuwen atu 14 ku niyazu'. kina 14 a niyazu'sa, Ciusinlun, Husida, Tamahu, Sʉhlʉnganʉ/Sulungan, Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising, Su'aci, Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani, Tanguhla/Dinkam, Mizuhu, Ua-asik, Lavulan, Dakus, Masuhuaz, Dai-ni.
mikuwanay a kenis a kitidan:Ngani Tao-Yuan (Cun-Cin-Po-nung a kamu: Ngani) i Cung-haw-ming-kuoiwaliay nuamisan nu Takaw, tepal nu amisan ku Taywan-Sen Nan-To-Sian Sin-i-siang, tepal nu walian ku Taywan-sen Tay-tung-sian Hay-tuwan-siang, Kalingku Cuo-si-siang, tepal nu tipan ku Namasiya a kenis, Cia-sian a kenis, Liw-kuy a kenis, Taywan-Sen Cia-i-sian Alisan-siang, tepal nu timulan ku Maw-Lin a kenis.[1]
Tao-Yuan a kenis i Takaw u tademaw nuheni cay kakatu'ud, u saahebalay ku kenis', ina kanatal sakatusaay satabaki a kenis, i tini a kanatal u sakatuluay kakawawanan a kenis, cay kayadah ku tademaw nuheni, satalakaway sakaenem kina kanatal.
u Tao-Yuan a kenis ku ce-sya-sepuyu'ay a kenis nu yuan-cu-ming. kya kenis u kung-fa-zengkapulungan mikuwan tu naudipan. mue'nengay i niya'du u Pu-nun ku katuuday. caay kahacica ku tademaw nu La-A-Lu-Wa atu Pay-Wan.[2]
laylay﹝hla'alua﹞hlasungag itauya tusaapatekenan a miheca ([hla'alua]) naiti i tawali i zau hlasungag uynikakitizaan,zyhan mabacekis nu bunung a tademaw. malimad i tip,makay Law-nong a sauwac, ikauyli, katukuh ayza sa Paw-lay a sauwac Se-tong unsinh a kitizaan malimad aca tyza i Tao-Yaun a kenis, sisa La-A-Lu-Wa a tademawnay tiniyai a kenis nuayauway a tademau, nay Po-nun a tademaw i cacay a patekenan walu a bataan a mihecaan namakay Nan-To atu Pusung a niyazu'. Isibukun u kenis nu Bo-nong ya Cin-se-cin,se-cin a tademaw sa ,u lsibukun,katukuayza Bonung a tademaw macalap ku tademau nuheni i patekenanizau ku siwa a bataan, u sakatuday nu binacadan, tawya Bunung mapulungay kYin-el-seuheni, tini i teban nu Sin-lun-seI Suy-se, Pilanse a tu Paicinse, Ta-la-lu-Se, Yan-El-seTao-Yaun-li, Zuy-Suy-Se, Cian-San-li, Pi-pi-Yu-SeHu-Sin-Li, La-Po-Lan-Se, La-Hu-Lan-Li, La-Ku-Se-Se, Cang-San-Se a kenis, Ma-Se-Wal-Se, Mia-San-lia Fan-Se. """""" itawya a tademaw nawitiyay kuenen i teban nu buyu, kadipunnan a Dipon sa maedes ku Yuancumin matalaw ku Dipun sisa sayway patideng ku "kitidaan nu kin-cal" mikuwan tu Yuancumin a binacadan anuayaw "li-fan a kawaw", bahbahhentu nudipun kutamedaw misaupu muenenitiniyay aydayniyadu, kia saluwayai musaupu a mikuwan. ""GaniGani ina kenis yukadipuan a ciday sa "Takaw-cu Ci-san-cun Liw-kuy-fn-se", itawya idaw ku Ya-El a niyadu', pangangan han nu Pu-nun a tademaw kya Gani, sisa pangangan nu Dipon ku Gani-se. u niyadu' paenenen han i teban nu Ya-El cu-cai-suo, mabusak i lilis nu Lao-non a sauwac atu saawali masadukudukuan nu Ta-Cu-Se a buyu'. mueneng i buyu nu pitu a lasubut katukuh cacay a malebut idaw ku pitu a lasubut.[3]
macuyacuay a sangnaw nu Mey-San""""(Masuwahoru"""""" iayaway u Mey-San sumamaday a kamu nu Pu-nun ku "Masuwahoru". nya imi ku "ina lala' yadahay ku uway". i laylay nu Pu-nun malimad, u Lao-Nung a sauwacsa u malimaday a kakitidaan nu Cun-se a binacadan. 70 inaMey-San nika mautang milinga tu kawaw itinalala", ya Mey-San kitidaan a niyadu, hakia iayaw pituway a bataan a miheca. :1.5 :1.5 ayza idaw ku tusaay a kakitidaan i Mey-San a kenis: sacumud nu May-San, atu May-san a niyadu' nu amisan nu cacay idaw ku pangkiw a kong-li. """"200128 patideng tu "macuyacuay a sangnaw nu Mey-San" ku Yu-san a kanatakay a pidangan i pabaw nu diheb nu Lao-Nung a sauwac i pulut nu nizadu'. patideng tu "macuyacuay a sangnaw nu Kuan-Shan"(Ma-Se-Wa-Hul-El a macuyacuay a sangnaw, ) i pabaw nu diheb nu Way-Cin a sauwac. sacacayay ku tusa a lasubu a depah, satusaay ku cacay a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku walu a depah. miawas tu talakaway a diheb ku tusaay a macuyacuay a sangnaw. mutideng i pabaw, mitengil tu suni' nu tasasaay a nanum, matebutebut ku balucu'.[4]
natimulan milakuitay a dadan (Nan-heng a dadan) 20 Tay-tusa a bataan-dadan kilul sa tu teban nu buyu' i tabal nu Lao-Nung a sauwac. hina dadan mahida u tatelecan kya analay a buyu'. sakatadudung a dadan nu Tao-Yuan nu sakaykalel milinglaku. madaduduc sa Nan-heng a dadan a sadikuday sabangcalay a piadihan kya lala'.
sa nay i nuayawan i Nan-huy a dadan kapah tu culilan, Nan-heng a dadan mahida u kalimulakay a tabesiw. yadahay a kadideng tayniay tayzaay i Pusung, malaheci u aiidangan atu malitmitan nu Tao-Yuan atu Liw-Kuay.
namapespes nu baliyus ku "natimulan milakuitay a dadan" (Nan-heng dadan), caay tu sikuli amisanga'. ayda makayza i Mey-shan-kuo a kakitidaan nu Tao-Yuan, anu taayaw i Tai-tung sa caay tu kakatukuhi atayzan.[5]
Tao-Yuan a yakubau yakuba sa ku sakatuuday a tademaw i Tao-Yuan a kenis, u sakalimulakan kina kenis. itini patideng ku mikuwanay a kenis, idaw ku yakuba, yubing, atu papanganganan (hu-ceng-se-wu-suo, ) sa.
i ayaw nu Tao-Yuan a yakuba, nitu'tu'kan a ba'tu u lalangawan atu laylay nu itinay a yuncuming.[6]
Tao-Yuan a kenis u yuancuming pitizaan a tuud971194 Tao-Yuan a kenis u yuancuming pitizaan a tuud patizeng tu ming-guo 97 a mihcaan cacay a bulad cacay a demiad. mueneng nya pitizaan i nutimulan nu teban nu buyu'buyu'an, i sakasiwa a bataan idaw ku sepat a kong-linu natimulan milakuitay a dadan Nan-heng a dadan. liwliw nu buyu', sabangcalay kya aadihan. 1372.53;; kya pitizaan tulu a kayakay, idaw ku 1372.53 ping-fant depahkaahebal. sakacacay a kayakay idaw ku sakakawanan, sakakamuwan, piadihan nu nisanga'ay a tuud atu adidi'ay a piadihan. sakatusa a kayakay idaw ku tatengilan atu cacudadan nu misanga' tu tuud. sakatulu a kayakay idaw ku satabakiay a piadihan. nuayawan nu banan idaw ku u tabaki'ay a kapalawan, kakitizaan nu pilisinan itini.[7]
canacanan a tuud1.: 1. piadihan mihida u sasing atu tuud. paadih tu lalangawan nu Punun atu La-a-lu-wa a pinacadan, paadih tu sakapahay a laylay. 2.:"""""""" 2. mapalawan tu lisin mahida u se-er a lisin, paluma' a lisin, pacumud i suku a lisin nu Punun atu bey-sen a lisin (takiaru) nu La-a-lu-wa a pinacadan. 3.: 3. nananaman mahida u kumu nu pinacadan, dadadiwan atu laylay a picudadan atu misalakiw mudadaw misulit mikulitay a picudadan.[8]
